title: Dr. Pandas Beauty Salon v1.2
description:

There are a ton of activities to do in Dr. PandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Beauty Salon, from matching bowties with hip sunglasses, to painting faces with glow in the dark paint, to spraying shaving cream on a pig with a 5 oÃ¢â‚¬â„¢clock shadow. You can make the animals as pretty, funny or crazy as youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d like! Basic hygiene activities like face washing and nail-clipping are combined with the fun of face painting and painting nails.

Key Features:
